creditline: Gift of Vanessa Laird and Timothy Raylor
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: concave foot with sides flaring outward to rounded shoulder; short, inward flaring neck; white body with brown geometric designs; band of designs with stepped triangle motifs on neck; body decorated with two identical designs of pairs of spirals and zigzags separated by vertical strips with squared-off spirals and triangles
title: Pot
